ComicInfo.Series: Clive Barker's Hellraiser: The Road Below
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kirsty Cotton, caught in the middle of a deadly family feud! The shocking story of the first time The LeMarchand Box summoned Kirsty Cotton continues! Rising star Brandon Seifert (WITCH DOCTOR) and hot artist Ibraim Roberson (UNCANNY X-MEN) shed new light on Kirsty Cotton's reign in Hell!
